roleset.name: negotiate terms

example.name: arg 1
example.text: Suddenly it will be about collective bargaining for teachers or something else that does n't involve a corporation at all , let alone Wall Street .

example.name: all args
example.text: I had a wild thought about his bargaining with the Pope for the souls of future priests, but I don't think that is an acceptable solution.
example.arg: for the souls of future priests

roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in BOLT-P01Vn classes correspond-36.1, battle-36.4, and settle-89. No Fn class.
